test.instr: (:ins (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X bed))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (color X yellow) (sort X cup))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (color X red) (sort X book))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X washmachine))) (:info (plate X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X white))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X closet) (type X container))) (:cons_notnot (:info (closed X) (:cond (type X container) (sort X closet)))) (:cons_not (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (type Y container) (sort Y washmachine)))) )
test.nl: Go to bed. Pick up red book. Close the washmachine. There is the white book on plate. The closet is closed. Pick up the yellow cup. There must be closet is closed. Do not put a book in washmachine.
